name: Space Needle
description: Space Needle, named after Seattle's iconic landmark, is a mostly sativa strain descended from Blue Dream and Vortex. Artists needing a creative kick will appreciate Space Needle's engaged andÂ imaginative buzz, while patients may look to this sativa for relief of stress, anxiety, and depression.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Happy, Hungry, Relaxed, Depression, Stress, Fatigue, Headaches, Eye Pressure, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
